item.title: CVE-2023-48317|2024-08-02T21:23:39.506Z -- vikas%20vatsa -- display%20custom%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vikas Vatsa Display Custom Post allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Display Custom Post: from n/a through 2.2.1.
